Header: Prime Minister reveals of establishing 500 sports training centres of international standards
Content: It is planned to establish 500 international level sports training centres throughout the island. This was revealed by Prime Minister Ranil Wickremasinghe. He further revealed of plans to establish this sports training centres within the next three years. The Prime Minister was speaking at the launch of the All Ceylon Schools Sports Festival. The launch of the 34 All Ceylon School Sports Festival was held at the Sugathadasa Indoor Stadium in Colombo. A Prime Ministerâ€™s sports Fund has been launched in collaboration with the National Olympic Committee for the welfare of the sports sector. Its prime purpose is to provide facilities for sports men and women. Speaking at the event, Prime Minister Ranil Wickremasinghe said that the Government has launched several initiatives for the uplift of education as well as sports.
